skills.name: LOST SOUL
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single-target.
• Grant Perfect Health and Soul Protect to each ally for 1 turn.
• Damage dealt increases based on your MAX HP.

skills.name: RECREANT
desc: • Remove Perfect Corruption, Crave, and Perfect Crave effects from all allies.
• Grant Perfect Titan Shield and Cleanse to all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: MALA FIDE
desc: Convert all damage into random damage equal to 10% of your MAX HP. Gain 1 Power and 15% Fury when you take damage.
